### ![](files/phd-new.png)

**Everything Will Happen At Dedicated Time !!!**

<div id="Countdown Great Day" style="font-size: 2.5em; font-weight: bold; color:rgb(79, 81, 217);"></div>

<script>
// Set the target date and time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)
const targetDate = new Date('2025-03-31T23:46:59');

// Function to update the countdown timer
function updateCountdown() {
    const currentDate = new Date();
    const timeDifference = targetDate - currentDate;

    if (timeDifference <= 0) {
        document.getElementById('Countdown Great Day').innerText = "Finally Dr Idrissa DIENG !!! What's next ";
        return;
    }

    const days = Math.floor(timeDifference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
    const hours = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
    const minutes = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
    const seconds = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);

    document.getElementById('Countdown Great Day').innerText = 
        `${days} Day(s), ${hours} Hour(s), ${minutes} Minute(s), ${seconds} Second(s) remaining`;

    setTimeout(updateCountdown, 1000);
}

updateCountdown();
</script>
